bibl.title: The Papyri Collection at the Center for Judaic Studies, University of Pennsylvania (Philadelphia): an Overview.
bibl.note: Presentation: History of the Collection. Purchased in 1920 from the recently widowed wife of a Dr. Camden Cobern. - Contents of the Collection. About 140 papyri pieces, some of them smaller than a postage stamp, of which 80 % or more are in Greek.

bibl.title: Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume II

bibl.seg: KRAFT Robert A., The Papyri Collection at the Center for Judaic Studies, University of Pennsylvania (Philadelphia): an Overview.

Isabella ANDORLINI, Guido BASTIANINI, Manfredo MANFREDI e Giovanna MENCI (a cura di), Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume II (Firenze, 2001) pp. 749-752.

Presentation: History of the Collection. Purchased in 1920 from the recently widowed wife of a Dr. Camden Cobern. - Contents of the Collection. About 140 papyri pieces, some of them smaller than a postage stamp, of which 80 % or more are in Greek.
